title: Former U.S. Postal Service contractor spared prison term for mail theft
text:
Published By: Buffalow News: City - Today 
Michael Lamacchia, 48, a former contractor for the U.S. Postal Service in Buffalo, was placed on probation for one year by U.S. District Jud...
